duties_responsibilities.duty: Interpreting data and drafting documents including protocols, amendments, agency briefing books, clinical study reports, and publications in support of Medical Affairs, RWE/HEOR and/or Clinical Development programs.
Drafting, editing and submitting high quality, medically accurate documents.
Preparation and QC of various document types: protocols, IBs, CSRs, etc, Health Authority Submission documents.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Medical Writing, Clinical Research, or a related field (Master's preferred)
